solution_line_template: If Charlize was {charlize_late} minutes late, each of her friends was {charlize_late}+{friend_more_late} = <<{charlize_late}+{friend_more_late}={friend_late}>>{friend_late} minutes late.
The total time for which Charlize's friends were late was {num_friends}*{friend_late}= <<{num_friends}*{friend_late}={friends_total_late}>>{friends_total_late} minutes.
Together with Charlize, the three friends were {friends_total_late}+{charlize_late} = <<{friends_total_late}+{charlize_late}={total_late}>>{total_late} minutes late.
